wikipedia_page.main: Andy King (23 July 1942 – 23 February 2015) was a Scottish professional footballer who played for Kilmarnock, as a defender.

response: Andrew or Andy King may refer to:
*Andy King (American politician) (born 1962), member of the New York City Council
*Andy King (footballer, born 1956) (1956–2015), English footballer and manager
*Andy King (footballer, born 1988), English born-Welsh international footballer
*Andy King, 72, Scottish footballer (Kilmarnock).Former Kilmarnock star King dies
